articles.title: A Marketer’s Guide to Selecting the Best Images for Your Content
articles.description: People tend to be inherently drawn to visuals. This is why including images with your blog and website content may help them reach a larger audience. Choosing appropriate images should be done in a strategic manner. Thought should be put into image selection, size, quality, and even alt attributes and naming, among other factors.

articles.title: The Metropolitan Museum of Art Gives Open Access to 375,000 Images
articles.description: In a move that acknowledges its online audience as an integral part of the museum experience, New York’s Metropolitan Museum of Art has made 375,000 public domain works of art available online and free for anyone to use. The museum waived any copyright to open domain works in its revised open access policy, as well as made available the database information about each image.
